format.name: SpacesInBetweenChecker
format.description: The argument value must use exactly 5 consecutive spaces between every pair of words. Only 5 spaces in a row are allowed in the string.

fn_schema.name: summarize_article
fn_schema.description: Summarizes an article to highlight key points and main ideas.

article_text.description: The full text of the article that needs to be summarized. The argument value must use exactly 5 consecutive spaces between every pair of words, and only 5 spaces in a row are allowed in the string.

summary_length.description: The desired length of the summary.

include_keywords.description: Whether to include a list of keywords extracted from the article. Defaults to False.
